summary: Diff adds a new frontend UI layer (App shell, admin/user screens, toast notifications, session-based routing) and introduces some unrelated/auth-related hooks and a backend stub. Several BuildRequest requirements are only partially evidenced, and some user-facing text constraints appear violated.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the admin panel, show a confirmation message after successful input/save actions across all relevant sections (including Settings updates) and show errors instead of success on error cases.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows success/error toasts for many save/delete actions, but Settings rate updates appear to be persisted without any success confirmation message.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use English for any user-facing text newly introduced/changed by this build request.
missing_requirements.reason: Multiple prominent UI strings are non-English (Bangla) in newly added components, and the footer includes a heart symbol as user-facing content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them from the frontend (no backend routing).
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that the actual image files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated (omitted/truncated added files list).

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty backend canister actor (backend/main.mo) despite requirements being frontend-focused and no backend behavior requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for backend changes; adding a backend stub is extra.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity/actor plumbing (useInternetIdentity/useActor) not required by this request.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly notes third-party auth providers are non-goals and II is not required for this request; these hooks appear unrelated to the requested UI/UX, toasts, production worker names, and logout fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Added user profile picture upload and persisted per-user avatar data in localStorage.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any REQ; this is new functionality beyond redesign/toasts/worker names/logout.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a promotional footer link/text (“Built with … caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also introduces additional user-facing text.
